duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver engaging and effective physical education and health instruction to students.
Create and implement lesson plans that align with curriculum standards and promote student learning.
Demonstrate effective classroom and behavior management.
Assess student learning and adjust instruction to meet the needs of individual students.
Communicate effectively with students, parents, and colleagues.
Participate in professional development and continuing education activities.

education_certification.credential: Valid Connecticut teacher certificate in 043-Health, PK-12 and 044-Physical Education, PK–12.
